title: Diferença
body: A populated place in the parish of Faial, where Manuel Carvalho Valdavesso, son-in-law of Valentim de Ornelas e Vasconcelos, 7th lord of Penha de Águia, built a chapel dedicated to São Luiz in the year 1725.

Manuel Carvalho Valdavesso: Son-in-law of Valentim de Ornelas e Vasconcelos, 7th lord of Penha de Águia
